## Source: ossf-package-analysis (88f7e10d49a063d957c6b948fc3f845538eebfda42bdb1746ea8529bc3274c3f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@time-loop/electron-panel-window' @ 3.0.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
